trends: There have been 221 other sightings in Chicago
There were no other sightings in Chicago on or around June 15th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI have been a recent advocate of disclosure, the et hypothesis, and a fan of anti gravity technology for a while now but have never seen my own UFO. Last night I was just sitting on my back porch here in Chicago when I noticed there were no stars out, except one very bright one. I stared at it for a while and noticed that it was very slowly moving upward. It would then remain stationary for a while, then drift very slowly sideways and then move up a bit more. It was odd because every time that thought to myself, "that could very well be a spaceship" it either seemed to sit still or move again, kind of messing with my head. I was really hoping it could be but I couldn't be sure if it was just Venus or Polaris. Hope to see more in the future! Disclosure!!
Summary: Night time and early morning star object moving slowly.
